title: Serendipity in Mengwi Guesthouse: 10 Min to Canggu
summary:
Welcome to our charming guesthouse, an oasis located 10 mins drive to Canggu's attractions. Perfect for solo travelers, couples, or remote workers, our guesthouse offers a delightful stay with a blend of comfort and community. Nestled downstairs, your private room features a cozy queen bed, a refreshing shared pool, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious dining area where you can connect with fellow guests.

Facilities:
â€¢ 1 Bedroom w/ AC
â€¢ Shared Kitchen
â€¢ Shared Pool
â€¢ Wi-Fi

The space
Our guesthouse, featuring 12 beautifully appointed rooms, offers an inviting and peaceful atmosphere. This listing highlights one of our downstairs rooms (rooms 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, or 9), located on the same floor as the pool, providing a serene retreat after a day of exploring. The specific room will be assigned based on availability.

Conveniently located by the main road, itâ€™s easy to explore the local area. Kaemon Bali is just a 1-minute walk away for a quick bite, and Torst Coffee is only a minuteâ€™s drive for your morning coffee fix. For more options, Passo by Nook and Old Pals (Hamburger Restaurant) are just 5 minutes away, perfect for a cozy meal or a tasty burger.

Additionally, the property is just a 20-minute bike ride to Canggu's bustling center, home to popular spots like Finns Beach Club and Atlas Beach Club. Renting a scooter is highly recommended to make exploring these attractions and the local gems even easier, and weâ€™re happy to assist in arranging one for you!

â€¢ BEDROOM
Enjoy a cozy downstairs bedroom on the same floor as the pool, complete with a comfortable queen bed and air conditioning for a restful stay. Room assignments are based on availability, and we will confirm your specific room closer to your check-in date.

â€¢ BEDROOM LAYOUT
â€¢ Upon entering:
- Right side: Rooms 1, 2, and 3.
- Left side: Rooms 7, 8, and 9.

â€¢ Pool View Details:
- No Pool View: Rooms 1, 7, and 9 do not offer a pool view from the bedroom.
â€¢ Pool View: Rooms 2, 3, and 8, located downstairs near the pool, provide a pool view from the bedroom.

Each room features a cozy layout to ensure a comfortable stay.

â€¢ SHARED POOL
The shared pool invites you to unwind and cool off during warm days. The pool size is 6.8m x 3m, with depth is 1.9m

â€¢ SHARED KITCHEN
Our fully equipped shared kitchen and dining area allow you to cook your favorite meals and savor them while mingling with other guests.

â€¢ Wi-Fi SPEED
Stay connected with Wi-Fi throughout the property with a current download speed of approximately 58.8 Mbps and an upload speed of 31.0 Mbps. Speeds may vary depending on the number of users and your distance from the router. During the rainy season, there might be occasional hiccups in the WiFi, even though we've used a good internet provider.

â€¢ NEARBY LOCATIONS
Lunch and Dinner Experiences:
- Kaemon Bali (Tumbakbayuh) - 1 mins walk or 42 m
- Torst Coffee - 1 mins drive or 350 m
- Passo by Nook - 5 mins drive or 2.1 km
- Old Pals (Hamburger Restaurants) - 5 mins drive or 2.3 km
- Kisah Rempah (Indonesian Restaurant) - 5 mins drive or 2.3 km
- Tony's New York Pizza Canggu - 6 mins driver or 2.7 km

Beach Outings:
- Pererenan Beach - 14 mins drive or 4.2 km
- Batu Bolong Beach - 17 mins drive or 6.1 km
- Canggu Beach - 18 mins drive or 6.8 km
- Mejan Stone Beach- 14 mins drive or 5.7 km

Clubs:
- La Brisa Bali Beach Club - 14 mins drive or 5.6 km
- COMO Beach Club - 14 mins drive or 5.6 km

Daily Needs
- Awol Fitness Bali - 12 mins drive or 4.2 km
- Wrong Gym - 10 mins drive or 3.9 km
- Circle K Munggu Pererenan - 5 mins drive or 2.0 km
- Pepito Market Pererenan - 4 mins drive or 1.6 km
- Maybank Atm - 12 mins drive or 4.6 km
- Damar Artha Abadi Money Changer - 4 mins drive or 1.8 km
- Fresh and Clean Laundry Service - 7 mins drive or 3.1 km

Come and experience a getaway like no other - where every moment is a blend of comfort, privacy, and engagement!

Guest access
Guests will have access to their private room located downstairs, as well as the shared kitchen, dining area, and pool. Feel free to make yourself at home and enjoy all the communal spaces.

â€¢ PARKING AREA
The parking area is conveniently located at the front of the property along the roadside, making it easy for guests to park both scooters and cars. If you arrive by car and the parking space seems limited, feel free to approach the reception, and our staff will be happy to assist in arranging parking for you. For added safety and peace of mind, the parking area is equipped with CCTV to ensure a secure environment for all guests.

Other things to note
â€¢ MONIS WORKSTATION RENTAL
Rent everything you need to stay productiveâ€”anywhere. Enjoy 10% off at Monis with promo code BVXMONIS on their website.

â€¢ POTENTIAL ROAD NOISE
Because the property is located near the main street, the sound of vehicles can occasionally be heard from the rooms. We suggest you to bring an earplug for increased tranquility.

â€¢ CONSTRUCTION NOTICE
There is ongoing construction nearby, expected to be completed by September 2025, with work taking place between 8 AM - 5 PM, so some noise may be heard. If you're sensitive to sound, we recommend bringing earplugs or noise-canceling headphones for comfort. In the meantime, take the opportunity to explore nearby attractions like Pererenan Beach (10 minutes ride) or La Brisa Beach Club (12 minutes ride). We appreciate your understanding!

â€¢ HOT WATER NOTICE
Please note that our property uses a water heater with a limited tank capacity, providing hot water for about 5 to 15 minutes, depending on the temperature setting. After that, it typically takes around 20 minutes for the tank to reheat. Unlike continuous systems in some countries, this setup may require a short wait between uses. We recommend planning accordingly, and we appreciate your understanding. If you have any questions, our team is always happy to help!

EARLY CHECK-IN
Early check-in is not available, and we do not offer luggage drop-off before check-in time. Please plan your arrival accordingly.

LUGGAGE DROP
- Before Checkin: Guests arriving before their room is ready can leave their luggage at the property starting from 9 AM by meeting our onsite staff. After booking is confirmed, we will share the staffâ€™s contact details so you can coordinate directly.
- After checkout: Luggage storage after check-out is available until 5 PM. Simply meet our onsite staff at the property, and they will assist you.

LATE NIGHT CHECK-IN
For a smooth and safe arrival, we recommend checking in by 5 PM, as some areas can be dark and challenging after sunset. Our online hosts are available from 9 AM to 6 PM to assist you. Please provide your estimated arrival time to our onsite team (number provided after booking) if you arrived after 6PM

LATE CHECK-OUT
Check-out time is strict, and we do not allow late check-outs. Please plan your departure accordingly.

â€¢ Airbnb Policy
Airbnb Policy states that you can't contact us directly if you haven't booked yet.

â€¢ Payment Method
We prefer to take reservations on Airbnb. Airbnb accept payment method using Credit Card. If you don't have a credit card, you can apply for an electronic card issued by banks like:
Jenius by BTPN (Indonesia)
Digibank by DBS
location: Private room in guesthouse in Mengwi, Indonesia

Bedroom and laundry:
Essentials
Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Home safety:
Exterior security cameras on property
There are four CCTV cameras: 1. CCTV in the kitchen faces the entrance. 2. CCTV at the entrance faces the parking area. 3. CCTV above, in front of room 12, faces downward. 4. CCTV above, in front of room 6, faces downward.
Kitchen and dining:
Kitchen
Space where guests can cook their own meals

Cooking basics
Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

Dishes and silverware
Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Parking and facilities: Shared outdoor pool - available all year, open 24 hours, lap pool
Services:
Luggage dropoff allowed
For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure

Long term stays allowed
Allow stay for 28 days or more

Building staff
Someone is available 24 hours a day to let guests in

reviews.text: Loved everything about my stay here! Itâ€™s really pretty and the room is simple but beautiful and has everything you need. WiFi works to get work done, hot shower and the outdoor area by the pool is beautiful! Kaemon restaurant that has great sushi is just across the street too! Highly recommend, I will be back :)

I ended up extending my stay â€” thatâ€™s how much I loved it here!
Mo Cactus Hotel truly feels like a hidden gem. Everything is consistently clean and well-maintained. The peaceful vibe, the friendly staff, and the beautiful surroundings made it hard to leave.
The pool area continues to amaze me, and the quiet countryside setting is just perfect for recharging. I also love how it's close to great coffee spots, yet still feels far away from the crowd.
Canâ€™t recommend this place enough â€” and yes, Iâ€™ll definitely be back again!

Absolutely loved my stay at Mo Cactus Hotel!
The place is super clean, well-organized, and beautifully maintained. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the kitchen is tidy and well-equipped.
The swimming pool is stunning â€” a perfect spot to relax and unwind.
I especially enjoyed the peaceful location. It's tucked away in a charming rural area of Pererenan, surrounded by greenery and tranquility. Great for chilling, resting, and just slowing down. Plus, it's close to some nice coffee shops too.
This will definitely be my go-to place whenever I return to Pererenan!

Nice and clean place! Although itâ€™s abit further out, recommend you have a scooter or if not itâ€™s like 10-15 mins bike ride via Gojek usually. Itâ€™s abit quiet but chill and area is pretty peaceful

10/10 stay !!! This was the perfect guest house out of the craziness of Canggu. Thereâ€™s not heaps around but youâ€™re a 5-10 minute bike away from everything you could need. Extremely good value for money. Hosts were responsive and there was always lovely staff around if you needed something. Couldnâ€™t recommend enough.

I had a great stay at this place (Mo cactus Village) ! The photos matched the description perfectly what you see is exactly what you get. The property is beautiful on the outside and just as lovely inside. It's a quiet and comfy spot, which made it perfect for relaxing after long days.
The host was super helpful and very responsive, which made the whole experience even better. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a peaceful and comfortable stay. And without a doubt, Iâ€™d stay here again the next time Iâ€™m in town!

Amazing, amazing, amazing. Wonderful property. Clean, spacious rooms. AC works very well, shower is amazing. 
Almost all rooms are pool view rooms, pool is clean always, kitchen is amazing too. 
Bed is super comfy, loved our stay!

That was a great stay! Room is clean and it looks very nice and calm. We felt good in that room and near the pool. Only the kitchen and its amenities were not encouraging - area to be improved.
Overall we would recommend that place for a stay im Canggu.

Great accomodation. Its very cleand and the pool also nice. The sharing kitchen also clean and all areas are exactly the same as in photos. Good internet. Nice shower. The only con here, cause its located right on the side of main road, you can hear motorbikes and cars passing. Its not that bad tho, for lightsleeper better bring your earplugs. Location like 35mins away from canggu. But there are some cafes and restaurants nearby.
We liked our stay in this quiet area, main places are close, in 10-15 minutes and itâ€™s very comfortable
Great place to stay at, felt very cozy and save. Beautiful room and bathroom. Staff was incredible

Simple, cute, & clean. Definitely worth what you pay for! The atmosphere is nice and modern. The other guests were quiet and friendly. AC + water heater/water pressure we're all great    
We noticed a few minor problems when we arrived but the staff were quick and kind to check it right away. There was a sewage type smell in the bathroom but that's just kinda normal in Bali haha 
Overall we would definitely stay here again! ðŸ’™
This is my second stay here, always a great experience! Met some really cool people this time too. Itâ€™s in a quiet area, away from main roads and the pool area is stunning.

THe best hotel in Canggu. Everything looks just like the picture. The facilities are new. The staff are very warm and kind. They helped me solve many problems. Next time I come to Bali again, I will choose to stay here for a month.
Lovely stay. Very clean place and great for the price! I would stay again!
